items.sentence: Tom wasn't the first one to congratulate Mary.
Tom wasn't a bit surprised by Mary's behavior.
Tom was surprised when he saw Mary doing that.
Tom warned Mary not to eat anything John made.
Tom still goes fishing with Mary every summer.
Tom isn't the one who advised Mary to do that.
Tom is the one who told Mary where John lived.
Tom is the one who showed Mary how to do that.
Tom hasn't yet laughed at any of Mary's jokes.
Tom finished dinner just before Mary got home.
Tom is likely to be unenthusiastic about that.
Tom is likely to be troubled by what happened.
Tom is good at practically everything he does.
Tom hasn't yet given me permission to do that.
Tom has the same kind of computer as you have.
Tom has been building houses for thirty years.
Tom has already told me what needs to be done.
Tom has already told me what I needed to know.
Tom gave me a nice umbrella, but I've lost it.
Tom fell asleep while he was watching a movie.
